txt.en: Sûlokil can be found throughout Arandor.\n\nYou should hunt sûlokil in order to gather meat for the soldiers of the Great Alliance.

'Yes, this meat will do nicely, and there is certainly a great deal of it! Your hunting skills are commendable. I shall have the meat cured and brought to the front line as soon as possible, and the soldiers will dine on sûlok steak! It will be a fine change for them, and they will toast our names in thanks!'

'Our store of provisions is now quite low, and we will need additional food here at Díngarth as well as on the front line. In order to meet these demands, we must hunt for food, but the small animals of Gondor and Ithilien are not large enough to provide enough meat for our armies.\n\n'We need an animal with more meat on its bones, and the great beast that is the sûlok of Mordor will provide the nourishment our soldiers require. Go forth and hunt the sûlokil in the Kingsland of Arandor.'
Bring the sûlok meat to Ohtar
Ohtar, Esquire of Isildur, is in need of additional food to send to the front lines.
Ohtar can be found at Díngarth.\n\nYou should bring the sûlok meat to Ohtar.
